comment_initialPower: The power a faction starts with upon creation. (Default: 50)
comment_powerLossOnPvpDeath: The amount of power a faction loses when a member dies to another player. (Default: 15)
comment_powerLossOnPveDeath: The amount of power a faction loses when a member dies to the environment (e.g., mobs, fall damage). (Default: 5)
comment_powerGainPerHour: The amount of power a faction gains for each hour at least one online member plays. (Default: 12)
comment_dragonEggPowerBonus: The permanent power bonus a faction receives for sacrificing a Dragon Egg. (Default: 5)
comment_inviteExpirationSeconds: The time in seconds before a faction invitation expires. (Default: 90)
comment_pvpTagDurationSeconds: The duration in seconds a player is 'PvP tagged' after being hit. If a tagged player dies from any source, it counts as a PvP death for power loss. IMPORTANT: This should be longer than any 'bleed out' timer from other mods (like Hardcore Revive). (Default: 150)
comment_factionRejoinCooldownMinutes: Minutes a player must wait before joining any faction after leaving one. Prevents power loss evasion. (Default: 120)
comment_allowPermanentAccess: Allow admins to grant permanent access via '/f access add [target] [perm] 0'. If false, a time must be specified. (Default: false)
comment_maxAccessTimeContainers: Maximum time in minutes that 'container' access can be granted. Set to 0 for no limit. (Default: 15)
comment_maxAccessTimeBreak: Maximum time in minutes that 'break' access can be granted. Set to 0 for no limit. (Default: 15)
comment_maxAccessTimePlace: Maximum time in minutes that 'place' access can be granted. Set to 0 for no limit. (Default: 15)
comment_maxAccessTimeInteract: Maximum time in minutes that 'interact' access can be granted. Set to 0 for no limit. (Default: 15)
comment_siegePhaseContainerMinutes: Minutes into a siege before attackers can open containers in defender territory. (Default: 15)
comment_siegePhaseBuildMinutes: Minutes into a siege before attackers can build/break in defender territory. (Default: 60)
comment_siegePhaseOverclaimMinutes: Minutes into a siege before attackers can overclaim defender territory. (Default: 85)
comment_siegeEndMinutes: Total duration of a siege in minutes. (Default: 90)
comment_siegeFailureDistance: Maximum distance (in blocks) an attacker can be from defender claims before the siege fails. (Default: 150)
comment_siegeImmunityHours: Duration in hours that a faction is immune to sieges after being sieged. (Default: 2)
